title: Add context-pane component with markdown rendering
description:
Create a new Lit component context-pane.ts that fetches and renders epic context markdown.

Implementation:
- Fetch context from /api/context/:epicId
- Render markdown to HTML (use marked library or similar)
- Style rendered markdown with Catppuccin colors
- Show loading state while fetching
- Show 'No context available' if 404
- Auto-refresh when epic changes

Markdown rendering should handle:
- Headers, paragraphs, lists
- Code blocks with syntax highlighting (optional)
- Links, emphasis, blockquotes

Run: npm test -- --grep 'context-pane'
acceptance_criteria: Component fetches and renders markdown context document
closed_reason: Fixed verification failure - added marked library node_modules files to git. This project tracks node_modules so the new dependency files needed to be committed.
